div.p: Interior Text: Under King Ptolemaios (son) of Ptolemaios and Arsinoe, the sibling gods, Year 1 which is Financial Year 2, month Phamenoth 10. Demetrios the physician has received from Nikanor the banker from the bank in Oxyrhynchus from the account of the physician-tax for the still-owing yearly wage for Year 39, which I receive from the bank, the physician-tax of Khoiakh for Year 39, 80 drachmas. Exterior Text: Identical Translation: B. Muhs, AncSoc 48 (2018) 93
